com.enjin.sdk.schemas.shared.arguments

Interface PaginationArguments<T extends VariableHolder<T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the implementing class
    All Superinterfaces:
    VariableHolder<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GetAssets, GetBalances, GetPlayers, GetRequests

    public interface PaginationArguments<T extends VariableHolder<T>>
extends VariableHolder<T>
    Fragment interface used to set pagination options for a pagination returned by the platform.
    See Also:
    PaginationCursor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default T paginate(java.lang.Integer page, java.lang.Integer limit)
      Creates pagination options that are then set.
      default T paginate(PaginationOptions pagination)
      Sets the pagination options.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.enjin.sdk.graphql.VariableHolder

        getVariables, isSet, set

    • Method Detail

      • paginate

        default T paginate(PaginationOptions pagination)
        Sets the pagination options.
        Parameters:
        pagination - the options
        Returns:
        this request for chaining

      • paginate

        default T paginate(java.lang.Integer page,
                   java.lang.Integer limit)
        Creates pagination options that are then set.
        Parameters:
        page - the page to start on
        limit - the number of items per page
        Returns:
        this request for chaining
